page.title: 20TRADE:CALOR GAS SHOP
page.content: THE CALOR GAS SHOP IN{CHICKERELL}SELLS {CALOR GAS }IN CONTAINERS OF VARIOUS SIZES TO PEOPLE FROM {CHICKERELL},{ {FLEET}AND {LANGTON HERRING} .ALTHOUGHN ALL HOUSES HAVE MAINS ELECTRICITY,IN SOME AREAS THE HOUSES DO NOT HAVE MAINS GAS.THAT IS WHY THERE IS A DEMAND FOR CALOR GAS.ALSO, MANY CUSTOMERS AT THE SHOP ARE HOLIDAYMAKERS IN THE AREA WHO NEED CALOR GAS FOR THEIR COOKING, HEATING AND LIGHTING IN THEIR TENTS AND CARAVANS.THE SHOP HAS THREE MEMBERS OF STAFF AND THERE ARE TWO MEMBERS OF STAFF WHO DRIVE THE LORRIES COLLECTING AND DELIVERING THE STOCK.NEAR THE SHOP THERE ARE TWO STONE BLOCK BUILDINGS WHERE THE CALOR GAS BOTTLES ARE STORED. AS WELL AS CALOR GAS, THE SHOP ALSO SELLS CALOR GAS FIRES AND REFRIGERATORS AND ALSO CAMPING EQUIPMENT.
